DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the X axis.

DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the Y axis. If not given, the value from _VoxelSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: VoxelSizeZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of voxels in the Z axis. If not given, the value from _VoxelSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: GridSizeX
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of the voxel grid in the X axis.

DocAttribute.Name: GridSizeY
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of the voxel grid in the Y axis. If not given, the value from _GridSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: GridSizeZ
DocAttribute.Documentation: Size of the voxel grid in the Z axis. If not given, the value from _GridSizeX_ shall be taken.

DocAttribute.Name: Voxels
DocAttribute.Documentation: Indication of voxels on the grid. The array is one dimentional where values are distributed in the following order: along X, then Y and finally Z.
